name: Remember To Forget
description:
Remember To Forget Remember To Forget is a visual novel horror game that explores the ways that humans process past memories. 

Broken into 4 chapters which mirror the 4 seasons, the game follows main character Cora in a world where people don’t venture outside at night. As the world slowly falls apart, she comes face-to-face with physical manifestations of old memories, leaving the player to decide her fate and choosing whether to live in the past, present or future.

WARNING: tackles heavier themes; life and death, imagery includes some blood and gore.

How will you decide to live?

Creator Notes:

Hey guys! This is my first ever game. I worked on it for the past 4 months and in that time, learned so many things. Though a steep learning curve, it was one of the most rewarding experiences I've ever had – any feedback is greatly appreciated!
